title: Carl Trueman on the Evangelical Elite—The Editor’s Desk
itunes:title: Carl Trueman on the Evangelical Elite—The Editor’s Desk
description: C​arl Trueman joins editor R. R. Reno on the podcast to discuss his article from the November issue,​ “The Failure of Evangelical Elites.”
